com.lowagie.text.pdf.codec

Class PngImage

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.lowagie.text.pdf.codec.PngImage

  • public class PngImage
extends Object
    Reads a PNG image. All types of PNG can be read.

    It is based in part in the JAI codec.

    Author:
    Paulo Soares (psoares@consiste.pt)
